thread.title: Arsenal news: Lucas Perez lifts lid on Arsene Wenger's mood | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Lucas Perez lifts lid on Arsene Wenger's mood | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Lucas Perez lifts lid on Arsene Wenger's mood | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 1:25 pm Arsene Wenger has had a rough few weeks (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal forward Lucas Perez has lifted the lid on the mood of under-fire manager Arsene Wenger amid speculation that he could leave the club at the end of the season. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The Frenchman has endured some bad results in the last few weeks, with his Arsenal side now surely out of the Premier League title race and staring elimination in the face in the Champions League. 
This has led to rumours that Wenger won’t renew his contract, which is set to expire in the summer, though Perez insists he knows nothing about his manager’s plans. Lucas Perez is unsure what the future holds for Wenger (Picture: Getty) 
The Spaniard claims Wenger is ‘calm’ and ‘excited’ about the rest of the season, despite some poor recent performances. 
‘It’s normal that after the defeat to Bayern there were criticisms,’ Perez told Cadena Cope. 
‘At the moment he does not transmit (to) us the idea that he is going to leave, but we do not know what’s going on in his mind.
